name: Magical Mining
description:
General Information :

We plan to release the game on Android and IOS (and maybe even on PC) in 2019. The game will be available in English only audio and the texts will be translated into French, English, Chinese, Japanese and Korean.

 

The game/synopsis :

– MM Menu (By Joris Darphin)

 

Play as Enidar or Nidar, vile goblins hungry for money. You will sink into an old, cursed mine that is said to have no limits. AND BINGO! By dint of perseverance (and especially avarice), you will find a cave filled with magnificent treasures. At its center, a distinctive object will catch your attention: a gold shovel set with beautiful gems. By grabbing it, the cave will collapse and a curse will be unleashed: you will never be able to get out of this cave and will be condemned to dig indefatigably if you do not want to die. Your only ally in this madness: your new shovel!

– Enirad et Nidar  (By Pauline Morille et Joris Darphin) 

 

Features :
  • You will have 4 seconds to dig. The more you descend to the bowels of the earth, the less time you will have!

 

  • Each time you dig, a new shape will be imposed randomly. You have to make your way in composing with the 12 different shapes!

 

  • Different gems will help you during your descent, but for that you will have to collect them first to discover their different powers.

 

  • Try to score as much as you can and prove to your friends that you are the best miner!
  • You will discover the depths of the cave and all the dangers it contains!
  • A full dubbing and a soundtrack that rocks! (By Alexis Laugier)

 

– In game (Backrounds et assets par Joris Darphin)
